title: How Did Mother Sita Nurture Luv and Kush? | Sri Sampati Dasa
speaker: HG Satya Gaura Chandra Dasa

segments.key_quote: Sita prepared love and kush to go and sing the greatness of Ram's character.
segments.summary: The speaker argues that Sita's upbringing of Luv and Kush, teaching them to glorify Rama, demonstrates her unwavering devotion and understanding of Dharma, contrasting it with modern examples of parental alienation.
